entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level 600 metres. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
